Product: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 6-core, 12-Thread Unlocked Desktop Processor with Wraith Spire Cooler
Reviews: ["I initially was thinking between this and the 3700X but after assembling and testing the performance of this CPU, i think i made a good decision and saved that difference in terms of pricing for a better GPU. The CPU performed great even though it was comparable as a intel i5 CPU but i think it feels so fast and i couldn't even feel the difference between this CPU and my other laptop that was running on an i7 CPU. The price point is really unbeatable for team red. Only issue was the CPU temperature itself was hovering around 50 deg even when it was idling and i actually had a NZXT Kraken X62 AIO cooler attached to it but i think it should be fine because it was still way beyond its limit in terms of the temperature which i read online and lots of people say that it was normal. Other than that, really happy with the CPU's performance and price point and kudos to Amazon for delivering it so fast ahead of schedule all the way from US to Singapore, it was so fast and efficient.", 'Upgraded from Ryzan 3 1200 to this. Quite an improvement to games loading speed. My favorite part is able to put up the Zoom wallpaper which cannot be done on the Ryzen 3. Simple improvement to QoL.', 'All arounder CPU with great price over performance. Definately a real bang for the buck performnce beast.', 'This is seriously, I am not kidding, authentic! The reason why it is so much cheaper as US it does not charge taxes or jack up the prices as local shops do in Sim Lim Square or other online retailers in Singapore, hence the price you see here is what you legit get, the real deal. Warranty is definitely covered by AMD Singapore, so you do not need to worry about warranty issues.', "At this point in time, by far the best value and right on the sweet spot of price to performance, disregarding the 1600AF, but as that had its price go up the best value is definitely this 3600 now. Only mild complain I have is that it runs a little hot when idle, but it's not that big of a deal, since it doesn't get much hotter under load.", 'Overall, best budget processor to get. My rig mainly for light gaming and daily net browsing, great performance with this CPU, just that a little issue is this CPU getting hot easily. I am using NZXT H1 with AIO Pump, CPU temp at idle avg 55C, gaming could be 70+C.', 'Ordered 28 May, arrived 9 Jun. Initially, I thought I got a DOA but managed to get it to boot after several restarts. Idle around 45-60c in Ryzen Master with a Wraith Prism Cooler stock fan curve in a non air-con room', 'Working straight out of the box with Asus Prime B550M-A motherboard.', 'Value for money, great performance. Came without any problems at all. Also bought a B450m Mortar Max to go along with this processor. Works out of the box, started the first try. I am very very happy with this purchase.', 'Fast processor that comes with cooler. Drops in on motherboard and works perfectly. I did not see any overheating issues as many has claim and the temperature hovers around 55-65 deg C.']

Product: RYZEN 3 4300G 4.10GHZ 4 CORE SKT AM4 6MB 65W RADEON BOX
Reviews: ['Un Ryzen valido, efficiente e di buona potenza in coppia con due ram da 8gb 3200mhz con profilo docp su una mobo Asus Prime b450m-k II. Il prodotto è sicuramente valido e performante ma ho riscontrato due problemi (non so se sono legati a questo modello, oppure con i Ryzen in generale), le temperature sono risultate abbastanza alte anche per utilizzi semplici, questo mi ha costretto ad acquistare un dissipatore ad aria di buona qualità ed il risultato raggiunto è ottimo, invece la sua parte grafica (Vega6) mi ha causato non pochi problemi come glitch grafici durante la navigazione web che ho risolto disabilitando la funzione di accelerazione hardware ma soprattutto in alcuni giochi la Vega ha mostrato il fianco a sporadici artefatti visivi, nulla di preoccupante ma ci tenevo a segnalare questo problema che potrebbe fare storcere il naso a molti. Per il resto... è un prodotto valido e che consiglio per configurazioni economiche, vi porterete a casa processore e scheda video praticamente in un colpo solo.', 'Très bon processeur 4x 3.8Ghz avec prise en charge de la fréquence RAM 3200Mhz, Graphic Radeon prend en charge la 4K UltraHD 3840x2160p à 60Hz.Livré avec ventirad WRAITH AMD qui est suffisant pour refroidir correctement le processeur.', 'It works very well.', 'Ha IGP quindi non è necessaria una GPU dedicata', 'Prodotto eccezionale scelto la mio consulente informatico!!!', '5star', 'Wurde in einem Office-PC eingebaut wo keine Grafikkarte eingebaut wurde, reicht neben normalen Anwendungen für hochauflösende Musikvideos. Somit genau das was wir gebraucht haben!', 'Eine sehr effiziente CPU mit 4 Kernen und 8 Threads mit einer performanten Grafikeinheit!Es gibt in dieser Preisklasse (zum Kaufzeitpunkt unter 85€) absolut keine Konkurrenz gür diese CPU, außer vielleicht ihr Vorgänger, den man teilweise auch schon für unter 80€ bekommt.Ich würde aber trotzdem zum 4300G greifen, da man hier einen höheren Takt bei besserer Effizienz für nur ca. 5€ mehr bekommt.Schön ist auch, dass diese CPU problemlos und in meinem Falle sogar mit dem Stock Bios auf einem älteren Bilstar A320 Mainboard lief, welches unter 50€ gekostet hat.Insgesamt habe ich für einen neuen Office PC mit dieser CPU, Mainboard, 16gb DDR4 RAM, 256gb SSD, Gehäuse, Netzteil, neue Windows 11 Lizenz nicht mal ganz 230€ bezahlt.Und an die Leistung kommt kein Fertig-PC in dieser Preisklasse ran!', 'Läuft prima. Bin begeistert von der Grafikleistung.Betreibe die CPU auf einem B550 Mainboard, habe der Grafikeinheit 16 meiner 32 GB Arbeitsspeicher zugewiesen.Gute Grafikleistung in FullHD und darunter. Sehr gut geeignet für Retro-Gaming. Auch okay für viele neuere Spiele, wenn man Abstriche bei Auflösung und Detailtiefe verschmerzen kann.Der mitgelieferte Lüfter dürfte gern etwas leiser sein, tut aber seinen Dienst.Sehr stromsparend!', '5 stelle perchè presa a poco . Assemblato un pc da battaglia. Perfetto.']

Product: Thermal Grizzly AMD Ryzen 7000 CPU Guard
Reviews: ['simple solution but perfect function! nuff said...', 'Bon produit mais attention à la prise de tête pour la pose.La nouvelle forme de ces processeurs est un mystère, un matin un ingénieur chez AMD a du faire un puzzle avec son enfant et il s\'est dit "Pourquoi pas une telle forme pour notre nouveau processeur".Le truc pénible s\'est le risque de bavure de pâte thermique.Oui aussi attention aux bricoleurs, ce n\'est pas la peine de serrer comme une brute le ventirad, AIO ou wartercooling custom, vous risquez de déformer le processeur.Points positifs :- Tarif 9,99€ pour trois protections- Une fois bien posé, pas de risque de bavures pate thermique.Points négatifs :- Usage unique.- Prendre son temps pour la pose, les gros doigts vous allez pleurer.- Notice pas clair.Je recommande pour les passionnés de modélisme, de miniatures ou de peinture minutieuse.Le produit fonctionne, mais cette galère a mettre en place.Pour les impatients, gros doigts, privilégiez des solutions a double effets maintien sans déformation et protection contre le bavures de pate thermique Thermalright ASF-Black AM5 par exemple (quatre fois plus cher mais réutilisable)', 'Per il prezzo alla quale sono stati acquistati mi aspettavo veramente molto di più, sia dal punto di vista qualitativo, sia dal punto di vista riguardante la cura nella realizzazione/misurazioni. L\'installazione non è stata delle più semplici a causa delle dimensioni delle varie dentature leggermente sballata. Ho preferito effettuare il procedimento di installazione del cuscinetto prima di "poggiare" la cpu all\'interno del soket, onde evitare che eventuali tentativi/errori durante la fase di incollaggio (tra l\'altro l\'adesivo è veramente forte) potessero ripercuotersi, in qualsiasi modo, su parti delicate (pins).A parte tutto questo, questi i cuscinetti sembrano svolgere abbstanza bene la loro funzione (ossia prevenire l\'accumulo di pasta termica nelle caratteristiche dentatature presenti sugli heatspreader delle cpu ryzen 7000).', "I put one on my AM5 CPU.  I wanted to do it out of the CPU socket, but it instructs to do it while in there so I took my time with it.  Removed a little of the backing off a corner, then slowly worked my way around while holding the CPU in place so it didn't shift if I had to pull or push on areas that weren't where they needed to be.  It takes a bit of patience, and you can't expect perfection from things as flimsy as this.  But what it does offer seems a heck of a lot better than nothing, and risking thermal paste getting where it shouldn't be.My one gripe is one of the three you get, had the backing peel off in transport and it got stuck to the instructions.  So I lost one right off the bat.  Didn't realize it until I'd installed this one with a new liquid cooler.  It would be smart to ship these with something more rigid to keep them from getting ruined before the customer even receives it.  I've included a picture of what I mean.Overall this gets a general thumbs up.  Just take your time with applying it, and if you have something small, and plastic, that may help manipulate particularly stubborn areas into place.", "So, to be clear, once installed, its snug and does its job. Doesn't interfere with closing the clamp, fills the spaces nicely, and sits below the IHS.THAT SAIDThe instructions are completely stupid. Once the sticky tape is pulled on the bottom, it is very difficult to place on the CPU WITHOUT making a mistake and pulling the CPU out of the socket - which I did, and ALMOST dropped it. If it had landed on the PINS, game over. Basically, it sticks to the CPU and your fingers at the same time.Best advice - apply the guard to the CPU OUT of the socket, get it to fit properly and snug, make sure you carefully clean the CPU bottom thoroughly with 90% alcohol or above (as you likely will have man handled the CPU by then) and let dry. When it is dry, and the CPU now has the guard applied, you can safely place it in the socket.", "The real gem here is the peace of mind. If you're using liquid metal, this guard is a no-brainer. It lets you reap the benefits of liquid metal without worry. Thermal Grizzly has delivered a top-tier product and backed it up with stellar customer service. Can't recommend it enough. A solid five-star product!", 'Gute Idee Umsetzung aber etwas blöd man muss die Kleber entfernen und dann etwas dran ziehen damit man es über die CPU bekommt dadurch klebt die Teile an der CPU und lassen sich nicht ausrichten nach den 2 Versuch habe ich sie weg gelassen', 'Ich verstehe den Sinn hinter dem "CPU Guard", aber die Passform hat bei mir nicht so richtig hingehauen. Hätte da für den Preis ein bisschen mehr erwartet.', 'Erfüllen ihren Zweck. Ist halt ein einweg Produkt. Gibt meiner Ansicht nach inzwischen bessere Lösungen.', 'The only thing to note is that the guard is really flexible. I used tweezers to apply and ensure a snug fit. The stretchy features helped a good seal surrounding the chip. Works great.']

Product: Thermal Grizzly Lapping Tool for Intel 12th Gen.CPU Contact Frame
Reviews: ['It did the job very accurately.', "I missed that the Thermal Grizzly Contact Frame was also required for this lapping tool to be of any value. As it is, I ordered the CF so no problem there. The problem is this is not a complete product ready for the customer to use. If TG can't include a contact frame with this then they and there sellers need to make it abundantly clear that you must purchase the TG Contact Frame as well.  I am sure the product will work great but it gets one star due to lack of clarity on the Contact Frame. Granted I am a little cheesed because my Contact Frame arrived without a T20 screwdriver due to the bag not being properly sealed at the manufacturer but that is a separate issue to this review.", '']

Product: JEYI 13th Gen CPU Bending Corrector Frame, Socket LGA1700 Bending Corrector Buckle for Alder Lake CPUs - LGA1700-BCF
Reviews: ["I also didn't use the thermal paste that came with the frame. I just wanted to throw in my results in case it is of any use.CPU: i7-12700kMobo: Asus Strix z690-gCooler: NH-U12AThermal Paste: Arctic MX-4Case: Antec Dark CubeI had tested using Cinebench R23 before and after for both stock and oc and the results were within margin of error.Just for reference the stock temps were 76c to 80c with 20c ambient. My OC was the AI option. It was bouncing between 4.9-5.1ghz. Sometimes it did go up to 5.3. It did thermal throttle briefly. CPU fans were full speed. It mainly thermal throttle as it approached 230 watts. I'm sure I could dial it in a bit.I didn't do research before this. It was also cheap entertainment for a day off so I do not feel like I'm out anything. It does look nicer even if no one can see it. I do prefer it over the stock mount. Also I usually don't overclock.It seems upon further reading the contact frame improves water cooling. They have a flat contact plate. The contact frame helps it out because the IHS is concave/convex. On air coolers they tend to also have a matching  curve on the plate. When pressed together they already make good contact.I can confirm that this does nothing for my Noctua cooler. The SecuFirm mount was good at holding the bracket back plate in place during the swap. and it looks way better then the old bracket. No one can see it though under a cooler.", 'Perfect, will buy again!', 'There were no instructions- atleast not in English. The QR code on the paper insert opened a chinese website. It went on easily enough, just make sure the plate on the back of the board stays in place and avoid overtightening to avoid damaging the pcb - don\'t force it. I have no idea if it had any affect on Temps as it was a new build. The picture is not exactly what you get, it shows the cpu bracket, a tube of thermal paste, a spreader, a thermal pad, two finger "gloves" and a tool for removing/replacing the screws on the cpu bracket. I got the bracket, the tool, the thermal pad and a foil packet of paste - which once opened will go to waste if you don\'t use it all. No tube, no spreader, no gloves.If you want the recloseable tube of paste and the spreader to make it easier to properly apply the paste, go with a different brand.If you\'re using a different paste entirely or your cooler has pre-applied paste, then it probably doesn\'t matter and you can save a few bucks using this socket corrector instead of paying for a brand name that does the same thing.', "13900KFs rocketing to 100°C, almost 3 seconds after initiation with cinebench r23 multicore stress test. Pull off the 420mm liquid cooler block and barely any thermal paste on the ends of the block's surface. You can see on the CPU's IHS that all of the thermal paste hasn't even been disturbed except for at both ends of the IHS. This is clearly an issue. I have used this product and it works. Won't get past 85°C after 2 hours of heat saturation in the same cooler with the same test. 253W, All 24Cores Boosting To 5.8GHz w/No Thermal Throttling. 🙂", 'Only dropped down like 4 degrees. Good price', "I ordered 2 of these for my kids' new computers. The installation wasn't too bad for someone who has built many computers. I used known good thermal paste, but the kit comes with a good amount. After watching videos about the increased thermals, I was sold on these brackets. I haven't done any testing with and without, but the core concept is there for any of the testing on videos about them.", "For $10-$15, this is a decent solution to Intel's awful Independent Loading Mechanism (ILM) for the LGA1700 socket. It does make contact with the board, the Thermal Grizzly option that does not. However the contact point is for this plate are insulated so it doesn't conduct electricity. So, the board won't get short circuited.There are no instructions included, so the way I did it is to gently turn the screws until you feel some mechanical resistance, then give it about another 45 degree turn and it should be good.I saw a 2-3 degree decrease in temps, but I mainly purchased this to prevent bending of the board. Your results may be different.", "Since I couldn't get the Thermal Grizzly version, I settled on this.  I ran Cinebench R23 on a loop prior to the install and was hitting 104C on my 12900K which is at 5.1Ghz all core.  This dropped my temps by over 15C, I sit at 90C on the hottest core and 73C on the coldest core. The install was easy, remove the old bracket and screw the new one on. I turned the screws until I felt a tiny bit of resistance and gave each screw not even a quarter turn after. I am a huge believer in these brackets and this one works perfectly! It comes with a bunch of stuff I didn't use but it's nice for people that don't have a million extra parts like I do.", 'Better temps overall - 15 C under load in my i7', "This is a nice contact frame that works well.  I use Handbrake regularly, and this contact frame dropped Handbrake temps by ~10 degrees C on my i5-12600K.  I'm now able to comfortably run the i5-12600K with an ID-Cooling air cooler, without throttling.The base contains non-conductive (phenolic?) strips that seem quite similar in material to the original Intel ILM.Installation is easy.  I used some Arctic MX-4 thermal paste instead of the supplied paste.  The JEYI has great thermal conductivity numbers, and it may work well, but I went with my tried-and-true paste.Highly recommended."]

Reviews: ["What I dislike about is that it came with a cooler that I don't need because I already have a water cooled system, Other than that it's a great Processor for the money hands down. I see people giving bad reviews simply because they didn't read or understand the description of the product and it's not fair on the sellers part, before you buy make sure you fully understand if it will work for your needs and especially before you open it up. Amazon has wonderful return policy", 'Core シリーズは予算高と思っていましたが、思うより何とかなるものかと思いました。Carleton からCore仕様への調整が済んで、できることが増えそうで嬉しさ一塩です。', 'La recomiendo bastante, 100% calidad precio, completamente sellada y a tiempo', 'La relation calidad precio y su bajo consumo eléctrico lo hacen ideal para setups de poco presupuesto', "Be warned that you may get an open box product with no indication anywhere on the listing. The Intel factory seal sticker was cut upon arrival. Box was also clearly handled, I didn't notice until I went to open the box. Product does work just fine as of writing this but who knows what will happen. The CPU cooler was without the pre-applied thermal paste which unless you have some can push your completed build a few days back.Although seller problems aside, it's a great value processer for less than $90. You can't beat the gaming or even desktop performance with anything in the same price bracket. Would highly recommend if you're on a tight budget.", 'Z590チップセットのマザーボードが安く購入できたのでCore i3-10105Fで1台組みました。メモリー16GB、グラフィックカードはGTX1660でFF15ベンチ標準品質、フルHDで快適の結果でした。FF15ベンチマークはシーゲートST3000DM001のHDDで実行です。2023年最新の3Dゲームでなければ楽しめると思います。なかなか良いCPUですね。マザーボード：MAG Z590 TORPEDOメモリー：KINGMAX DDR4-2666MHz 8GB x 2CPU：Core i3-10105Fグラフィックカード：GG-GTX1660-E6GB/DFハードディスク：ST3000DM001', '第２世代i7よりこちらに変更当然ながらもっさり動いてた２世よりも10世のほうがサクサク動きOfficeソフトも遅延なく動く。今回は１０年以上前の既製品より自作PCに変えたのでレビューにはなりません。それに使うのは自分ではないので。マザーボードはこちらを使いましたASRock \u200eH570M-ITX/ACグラフィックボードはこちらをGeForce GTX1650 LPケースはこちらをCoolerMaster Elite 120 Cube キューブ型Mini-ITXメモリはメーカー名記載のシール紛失で不明DDR4-2666 8GB を２枚電源は玄人志向 700W', '初心者の方で自作PCを作るにはよいかも！フォートナイトで使用してますが、通常マッチで144fpsは安定していて、画質も良いです。', 'Item is of tip-top quality! Splendorous packaging. Exceptionally quick dispatch.', '中々\u3000i3 10105Fにしては使い心地良いのでは\u3000昔はペンティアム2.8Gで十分で\u3000今でもwin2000が動いてますもん\u3000アドビプレミアで編集三昧でした\u3000数倍以上の性能\u3000満足しています現在\u3000H510M-A+i3 10105F(win11pro\u300022H2)DDR4-2666 8G×2で使用中\u3000面白いのは昔はオーバークロックで楽しみましたが\u3000今回はアンダークロック\u3000電源を89%にすると\u30003.29Ghzで十分\u3000楽しいね\u3000サクサク動くんですから\u300098%だと3.59Ghz 100F並みでも使用\u3000楽しいね\u30003.7Ghz-4.4Ghzなんて私には無意味  ただしwin11の起動\u3000シャットダウンは異常に遅い\u3000HDD(GPT)の人は覚悟してね\u3000 1分以上ネット上のあらゆる設定を試したが\u3000全く利用出来ない\u3000組み合わせが悪いのだろうね その後HDDを交換\u30001Tに新規インストール\u3000一気に真面なPCに改善しました\u3000但\u3000外した東芝500Gにエラー無しインストールDVDからコマンド使ってクリーンに\u3000再度接続して\u3000チェック\u3000問題無しの判定\u3000どうなっているのかね']

Reviews: ["Ya le realice varios benchmark y en todos salio excelente, diferentes mobos y gpu's y ha salido con excelentes calificaciones", "Easy to install, speeds inline with online results once I replaced the cooler.  Stock cooler isn't very efficient.", 'lo combine con una rtx4070 y va de maravilla', "I got the i7-11700f, this model has no integrated graphics but im using it as the cpu for a proxmox server. I can say it works great, I can run the game servers I want, as well as host the website I want without so much as a hiccup.The cpu has intel's virtulaization technology in it so device pass-through is possible, and it having 8 cores (16 with hyoer threading) means I can have many instances of vms running at the same time.  It doesn't use a lot of power and that means it will stay cool and it will keep the fans quiet.All in all if I wanted to use this for gaming I see no reason why this couldn't be used in a sub1k gaming build the server I built cost me about 600$ total, and runs great.", 'Finally installed my cpu.Brand new in the box.Works excellent.Delivery 5 out of 5 ( Free expedited) All the way to Vancouver.Quality 5 out of 5I will buy from here again:)Thanks for the positive experience!', 'Buen producto', 'I purchased this and a new motherboard because my old setup was incapable of supporting Windows 11.  This  CPU does, and I was able to upgrade to 11 when it was made available to me.', 'hasta el momento este procesador anda muy bien, muy rapido, recomendado!', 'ない事知らずにモニターが映らず焦りました(笑)', 'Fan sounds like a pet store. Squeaks, squeals and chirps. Not what I had in mind for a silent ITX build. Had to buy a Noctua NH-L9x65 to maintain sanity. Been building PCs since 1989, and have never HAD to replace the stock CPU cooler due to excessive noise. Intel owes me seventy bucks now.']

Product: Intel Core i9-11900 Desktop Processor 8 Cores up to 5.2 GHz LGA1200 (Intel 500 Series & Select 400 Series Chipset) 65W
Reviews: ['OK', "Got my memory in the mail and was waiting for my processor to arrive so i would do one job.Processor came in DOA. had installed everything and went to start up and nothing no reaction at all.Swapped the processor and my system started up immediately. System bios was set ok and was seeing only one memory swapped the memory to test and one was working and one was defect. Bot packages came with a broken seal so i think they were returned because of these problems. I was insured so i got a new processor and new memory send to me. Now lets hope it's not the same issue with the new one.UPDATE: Got The new processor in and went to put it in my new AS ROCK 470 made by CUK and sold by Amazon. Again a faulty processor send by them. Spend hours mailing to CUK have about 28 mails the motherboard supprots the processor. Did everything we knew with a computertechniacian from school but nothing processor didn't work for the second time. Now it comes even if amazon knew the processor was faulty i explained to them i can't get the processors on time back because i'm all the way in the caribbean now and postal service(except DHL) is slow and it will take time to send back. Took me 4 chats to explain they understand. Still i'm waiting and waiting on my refund now about 6 weeks later they tell me Yes but there's a 73.95 dollars restocking fee so i was insured for 44.95 they got that money for the processor they send you that is faulty. You send it back they claim and again send you a faulty one. They claim restocking fee again. This is a good article for CNN about how it functions at amazon. I won't buy nothing like this again and didn't believe poeple complaining about Dead One Arrival till now. Good service AMAZON.", 'I love non k intel processor  as I hate heat', "Was not shipped from Canada, shipped from the US, didn't come in the original box (((WITH NO CPU FAN))). HOPFULY IT MAY WORK....FINE OUT OVER THE WEEKEND.", "It's great but the price is still high for being a previous generation of processor", 'Super rapido, recomiendo conseguir un cooler adicional para enfriar el cpu. El de fabrica que viene no lo aguanta y se apaga.', 'Ca fait cher pour un ventilateur']

Product: Intel CORE I3-10105 3.70GHZ SKTLGA1200 6.00MB CACHE BOXED
Reviews: ['Niente da eccepire su una CPU Intel.Ha integrata al proprio interno la grafica video.', 'Processador atualizado e com excelente velocidade, vale a pena.', "Processeur pour un pc monté, ciblé sur de la bureautique.Le processeur est posé sur une carte mère de chez MSI couplé à 16go de RAM. Aucune carte graphique en supplément.L'écran est directement connecté avec le chipset graphique du processeur.Aucune latence, de bugs sur une utilisation normale de bureautique.", "Ho preso questa versione e non la F solo per la possibilità di risparmiare sulla scheda video (essendo il mio secondo pc). Dicevano che senza scheda video il pc sarebbe andato bene solo per il campo minato, e ho voluto provare per vedere con i miei occhi. Caspita, ero pronto a ordinare una scheda video (come ho fatto per l'altro computer che è più prestazionale), ma ho visto che va molto bene. Senza eccellere ovviamente (chi è esigente spenda pure 500-1000 euro in più di scheda video dedicata). Ma ho notato che gioco benissimo anche a League of Legends senza rallentamenti o scatti. Sarà anche merito della scheda madre, sarà la RAM di 16GB, sarà l'hard disk velocissimo M.2, sarà il monitor non esageratamente grande (perché è ovvio che se spingete il video su un 42 pollici o su un multischermo il sistema sarà un po' sotto stress). Fatto sta che il nuovo pc neanche si sente quando è acceso (quella ventola che gira in continuazione non c'è!!! Che bello!). A questo punto vado avanti così finché non mi dà problemi, ma dubito che me ne darà perché non sono uno streamer o un gamer professionista.", 'werkt goed.fijne prijs.pas wel op de foto is misleidend, er word aangegeven dat dit een 11e generatie is, dit is niet zo het is een 10e generatie processor.verder is de processor goed, ik gebruik hem voor mijn gaming pc en games spelen vloeiend', 'Prezzo ottimo, processore fantastico per un utilizzo ottimale del pc , o volendo anche per un Gaming in full hd abbinato ad una scheda video economica', 'ótimo desempenho', 'Dados los precios actuales de los microprocesadores, este i3 es una buena adquisición para montar un pc económico de uso general, tanto para ofimática y navegar como incluso para jugar sin demasiadas pretensiones.Por poco mas de 100 euros, no se puede pedir más. Cumple con su cometido de presupuesto ajustado y prestaciones aceptables. Un 4 núcleos (8 con HT) es suficiente y llega hasta los 4,4 Ghz en modo turbo.Y si no necesitas jugar, no hace falta ni comprar una tarjeta gráfica, con lo que aún sale mejor, dada la locura de precios de las gráficas.Yo totalmente satisfecho por el precio.', '4 stars for the misleading title. Would have been 5 stars because product is good, delivery speed fantastic and brand new genuine item sealed in box.', 'INTELIntel I3 10105.Procesador básico de Intel con gráficos integrados.Procesador ideal para montar equipos básicos y destinados a la ofimática, es muy solvente para este tipo de tareas y se desempeña muy bien.También ideal para mirar contenido social, videos o plataformas de streaming.Se puede jugar con el a juegos, pero siempre que sean de gráficos muy discretos.La verdad que es una opción excelente para gamas de entrada o ordenadores de presupuesto ajustado.Buen producto y compra 100% recomendada.']

Product: INTEL BX8070811400F
Reviews: ['This cpu is great bang for your buck! I brought this for my first pc build, couldn’t be happier! At $200, this offers lots of performance for that amount of money! Currently it’s paired with the gt 1030 aero, but that gpu is too weak to be paired with this i5. I’m planning on getting the rtx 3060 ti so this i5 is always being used to max performance. Also, make sure you don’t use the standard intel cooler it comes with in the box. I recommend the Vetroo V5 cpu cooler instead. it’s cheap, and is argb.', 'ゲームはしないので、私にはオーバースペックでした。asrockのマザーにつけたのですが最初uefiから抜け出せせず、往生しました。原因はマザボuefiのcsm設定の変更で直りました。今は快調に動いてます。', 'Como jugador gaming que soy, siempre estoy buscando los mejores procesadores que me permitan jugar a los últimos juegos sin ningún tipo de retraso. En este sentido, el Intel Core i5-11400F es un procesador de alto rendimiento que recomiendo encarecidamente.Con una velocidad base de 2,6 GHz y 12 MB de caché inteligente, el i5-11400F ofrece un rendimiento excepcional en juegos y otras aplicaciones de alto rendimiento. Además, este procesador también es compatible con la tecnología Hyper-Threading, lo que significa que puede procesar hasta 12 hilos simultáneamente, lo que lo hace ideal para aplicaciones que requieren un procesamiento de múltiples núcleos.También es compatible con la tecnología Intel Turbo Boost, lo que significa que puede aumentar su velocidad de reloj hasta 4,4 GHz en momentos de alta carga de trabajo. Esto es especialmente útil cuando se juega a juegos intensivos en gráficos o al realizar tareas de edición de video.En términos de compatibilidad, este procesador es compatible con una amplia variedad de placas base, lo que significa que se puede usar en una amplia gama de sistemas de juegos. También es compatible con la memoria DDR4, lo que significa que puede usar la última tecnología de memoria para obtener un rendimiento óptimo.En resumen, como gaming profesional, es una excelente opción para aquellos que buscan un procesador de alto rendimiento que ofrezca una experiencia de juego sin retrasos. Con su velocidad de reloj de hasta 4,4 GHz y su compatibilidad con una amplia gama de placas base, este procesador es una excelente opción para cualquier sistema de juegos de alto rendimiento.¿Recomendable? SIN DUDA', "Lo ho comprato per sostituire la mia vecchia CPU che si era rotta, il suo lavoro lo fa', sia per gaming sia per la navigazione quotidiana .Certamente per quanto riguarda il gaming non aspettatevi di giocarci a titoli recentessimi , comunque GTA5 và na favola anche a prestazioni alte.La temperatura non si alza nemmeno troppo con il dissipatore già incluso nel box.Già qualche mese che lo uso, non ho trovato nessuna pecca  (per quello che ci faccio)", 'Buen rendimiento, silencioso, perfecto para multitareas y juegos moderadamente demandantes', "la CPU Intel i5-11400F è un'ottima scelta per ottenere prestazioni elevate a un prezzo vantaggioso. Con i suoi otto core e 12 thread, offre un notevole aumento delle prestazioni rispetto alle generazioni precedenti. È efficiente dal punto di vista energetico e dotata di un sistema di raffreddamento integrato che mantiene le temperature sotto controllo anche durante le attività più intense. L'installazione è semplice e il supporto Intel è di grande aiuto. Nel complesso, è un'ottima soluzione per chiunque cerchi un processore performante senza spendere una fortuna. Consigliato sia per assemblare un nuovo PC che per effettuare un upgrade significativo da una CPU precedente. Soddisfazione garantita!", 'Den fungerar jättebra och inga bekymmer 👍', 'Ho preso questo processore per assemblare il mio PC e mi trovo benissimo.', 'Ottime prestazioni ad un prezzo molto concorenziale.', 'De momento muy contento venia del renewed nuevo , buenas temperaturas y desempeño.']

Product: Intel Core i9-11900K (3.5 GHz / 5.3 GHz)
Reviews: ["Ladies and gentlemen, if you're ready to turbocharge your computing experience, meet the Intel Core i9-11900K Processor, a true powerhouse in the world of CPUs!First things first, the numbers speak volumes – with a base clock of 3.50GHz and a turbo boost that can hit an astonishing 5.3GHz, this processor is like the Usain Bolt of the CPU world. Whether you're gaming, content creation, or tackling heavy computational tasks, it doesn't break a sweat.The 16MB cache is like a ninja's secret stash of data, ensuring lightning-fast access to your most frequently used files and applications. It's like having a direct highway to your data, minimizing any pesky loading times.With 8 cores and 16 threads, multitasking is a breeze. You can run multiple applications simultaneously without your PC even noticing. It's like juggling with eight balls in the air while riding a unicycle – effortless!Now, for the tech enthusiasts, the FCLGA1200 socket compatibility opens up a world of motherboard choices, allowing you to build the PC of your dreams around this beast of a processor.But here's the catch – like all high-performance champions, this Intel CPU doesn't come cheap. It's an investment for those who demand the absolute best from their PC. But hey, when you're running at 5.3GHz, you're in a league of your own.In conclusion, the Intel Core i9-11900K Processor is a true gem for enthusiasts and professionals looking to push their PC's performance to the max. With blazing speeds, ample cache, and multitasking prowess, it's a game-changer in the world of CPUs. Just be ready to shell out for the privilege of owning this computing marvel. Fasten your seatbelt and get ready for a turbocharged computing journey! 💻⚡🚀", "This processor is an upgrade I made from an earlier gen i7 processor so I'm seeing a nice performance boost. I paired this processor up with an NZXT X53 cooler which keeps it at around 60C even under heavy workloads. Gives great results in benchmarks like Time Spy etc. The temperature is important since it can teach quite high temps without good cooling. Install went well and I have no complaints. This processor will hopefully serve me well many years into the future, I really think it's nice.", "Provengo da gen.10 i3 10100f, poi i5 10800k, il salto alla gen. 11 é stata una decisione obbligata per mantenere il socket LGA 1200 e poter operare con un i9. L'architettura gen. 11 si sente nel multi core, quindi l'upgrade c'é eccome, inoltre il prezzo é anche piú vantaggioso rispetto alla precedente gen. oltremodo quotata (senza senso). Spendere di piú per avere una cpu di un anno e mezzo piú vecchia solo per sentito dire, non ha fondamenta. Sono contento per almeno un anno. Venditore USA, preciso e veloce, da Boston spedisce in due max tre giorni lavorativi, la cpu é a casa vostra. Se proprio devo trovare un appunto, la foto mostra una cpu boxata, invece a me é arrivata la versione tray, ma poco importa insomma. Top cpu", 'Gewohnt schnell von Amazon geliefert.Prozessor ist ein kleiner Hitzkopf aber mit entsprechend guter Kühlung kein Problem.', 'Ci sono stati problemi con un articolo ma il servizio clienti è stato più che efficiente dando prova della loro professionalità. Davvero ottimo', 'Tres bon processeur', 'Veloce e prestante', "mais le plus important c'est ce qu'il y'a dedans", "Avevo bisogno di un processore nuovo. Ho visto questo prodotto che per qualità e prezzo non aveva eguali. passo da un i5 e devo dire che l'incremento prestazionale del pc è davvero notevole. Il venditore è disponibile e molto gentile. Il corriere ha consegnato il prodotto con due giorni di anticipo. Grazie ragazzi servizio impeccabile e prodotti eccellenti.", 'Assemblato da qualche giorno il mio pc e devo dire che sono impressionato dalla potenza che offre la mia scheda affiancata a questo processore. Credo di non aver mai avuto un pc così! Spedizione rapida e prezzo accessibile.']

Product: AMD Ryzen 9 5950X 100-100000059WOF Processor 16-Core 3.4GHz Socket AM4 CPU w/o Fan Retail
Reviews: ['Thought I would treat myself with an upgrade as I have always had a upper range motherboard, GPU ect when I built my system, but financial restraints meant it was the CPU which was the one item I had decided to shave down on at the time of the build. Not disappointed with the 5950x, motherboard accepted the new CPU and done the usual faff, a few restarts to reset all the settings, bios settings and re-login to windows ect, but after that it settled in well after a few minutes. I have to admit to having a smile when I seen the 16 core, 32 threads show up in the hardware manager. My assassin cooler thankfully kept this CPU cool enough at 69/70C when I ran a stress test (all cores and threads running full wack, stock settings), with a room temperature of 23C (summer time) I was a bit apprehensive about that and feared I might have to invest in a A.I.O cooling system to run the 5950x. I would say that an A.I.O might be required if I wanted to over clock though. Some may see the 5950x as over kill but sometimes it nice to have the high end hardware (have and not need, than to need and not have) and it has been a pleasant purchasing experience from both the product and the seller.', 'Yo me dedico al mundo audiovisual, lo utilizo para mover vídeos de gran peso , y definitivamente era lo que andaba buscando para trabajar cómodo y sin esperas.', 'Una potenza che vale il costo', 'De lo mejor y con calidad. No tiene problemas para funcionar y cargar cualquier tarea', 'This product works extremely well and have paired it with the noctua dh-15 and while it is suppost to run hot it stays at 40 easily when at standby and while playing it goes up to a max of 60 with the graphic settings at max.It also handles extremely well with unreal engine 4.2 when designing and I’ve only managed to pull around 79% max out of it when using it at heavy workloads', 'Procesador perfecto para trabajar, y bueno para jugar, el problema es que es un poco perezoso en las latencias con las memorias, si quieres evitar eso hay que hacer overclock y si no tienes buena refrigeracion es como si no hicieras nada. He visto a mucha gente hablar maravillas, pero, o no me ha tocado un buen silicio o las review estaban compradas. A pesar de tener una fuente y placa base de bastante calidad, que es lo primero que te reprochan. No me convence, cambiare a Raptor Lake, ya que Alder Lake no tiene esa pereza. Ojo!!! no digo que sea mal procesador, en multinucleo es una bestia, pero muchos problemas con las memorias, que aunque dicen que lo han solucionado, no es asi, o no del todo.', "Commande bien arrivé à la maison, conforme à la description, un peu d'appréhension suite à certains commentaires négatifs qui disait avoir reçu un colis vide ou abimé. Autrement le Ryzen 5950X vaut son pesant d'or, mais les performances sont là.", "I ordered this to replace a 3950x chip that had gotten fried by a short in a bad component.  Yes, I payed a lot more than MSRP for it but I'm glad to find a copy I could purchase during this time when they are scarce.  The 5950x is a beast of a chip but it's also a better design.  I was able to get the same 64Gb of RAM running with the same settings except that I was able to back down the LLC for RAM setting and move from max setting to 3 on a scale of 5.  Despite this less intense LLC the L1 cache ran about 60% faster; L2 was a little faster and rate of exchange with L3 and RAM was about twice that of what I found for the 3950x testing with MEMTEST86.  This means it runs faster and cooler at the same time.  I attribute this to the fact that they've unified the L1 Cache to 2 areas instead of 4.  All of this while running the RAM seamlessly under +/- 18 hours of intense testing with no errors at 3600Mhz, instead of the default 2133Mhz.  (AsRock Creator x570 Mother board)  You can't get 4 sticks of this much RAM to run at this speed - well beyond base spec for the chip -- without research and tweaking.  However, it runs like a top once you find the design.", 'I upgraded to the 5950x from a 3900x & i think its a pretty sweet upgrade imo ! it is a Beast But I Dont Think a NZXT Kraken X73 is Enough Cooler for it (360mm AIO) Even with all 3 Fans running at 100% fan speed so just be aware is all i am saying ...Great CPU But Its hard to tame it when its at 100% full bore ! Maybe i should Explain a tad first Hot To me is 70-75c I Dont Want to run any thing above that !But amd says its fine to what 80-85c..Im just not going to do it but you can if ya want !', 'Ich benutze diesen Prozessor für Virtualisierungen und er macht was er soll und zwar richtig gut. Aber es ist dringend eine Wasserkühlung erforderlich. Vor dem Einbau muss eine Biosaktualisierung durchgeführt werden.']

So if you're on a  tight budget, you could use this but you will need a least an rx580 gpu.Any question, let me know.", 'Lo instale en una máquina para punto de venta, no requiere una gran capacidad por lo que para el trabajo va muy bien', 'buen prducto', 'Für den Preis eine gute CPU nur leider reichen mir die 2 Kerne nicht.', 'I bought this just because the curiosity got the best of me. Product: AMD Ryzen 7 3800XT 8-core, 16-Threads Unlocked Desktop Processor
Reviews: ['Reicht aus um alle Spiele zu spielen 😉 Temperatur ist nicht so extrem wie bei den neuen CPU. Erledigt alles zuverlässig 😊', 'I decided to go ahead and build a new PC for Christmas. I wanted the 5800X, but I have not been able to procure one, so I settled on the 3800XT. Coming from an i7-7700K, a whole heck of a lot has changed. AMD actually did a pretty good job extracting the most performance possible out of the silicon from TMSC\'s 7nm fab process. Pair this CPU with a quality motherboard and DDR4-3600 CL16 RAM (Crucial Ballistix is excellent for the money and over-clockable), set the infinity fabric and memory data rate to 1800-1900MHz in a 1:1 ratio, tighten the timings using the Ryzen memory timing calculator and pretty much leave everything else on auto. You will get excellent performance, see significant latency improvements, and you can also experiment with the PBO settings and under-volting to see what works best. This is actually much closer to Intel\'s offerings for gaming than pundits claim, especially with the newer AGESA BIOS firmware. And for productivity and power efficiency, AMDs Ryzen chips are the reigning champs.For single thread performance, I am scoring 569 in the CPU-Z bench and nearly 6,000 for the multi-threaded benchmark. For reference, my massively overclocked i7-7700K was only slightly lower for single thread, but considerably less than half of the 3800XT\'s multi-threaded score. I am very impressed. I am also not having any temperature issues, using the Be Quiet Dark Rock 4 heatsink and a -100 mV under-volt offset., which gives me about 32 degrees C idle temp and around 60-65 degrees C under 100% load. Be aware that under-volting may impact your CPU\'s performance. I noticed that my multi-threaded bench scores went down with an under-volt, but my single-thread scores went up with an under-volt, which is fine for me since I am mostly gaming, I will sacrifice a bit of multi-threaded performance for better single-thread performance. Also, I tried various PBO settings, none of which improved my particular chip\'s performance. I suspect the 3800XT on the latest silicon from TSMC is already optimized, hence PBO did not help me. Make sure to install the latest AMD chipset drivers and select an AMD Ryzen power plan for Windows. I am currently using the "AMD Ryzen Balanced Power Plan", but the performance plan is good for another 1-2% performance at the expense of power consumption.I have 2 cores that can hit 4.725 GHz (#0 and #3), with 4 cores routinely hitting a bit over 4.6 GHz and the other 2 typically around 4.55 GHz. During a long-running, multi-threaded load, I am seeing about 4.5 GHz on average across all cores, which I think is very good. Some have questioned the value proposition of the 3800XT since it is more expensive and does not come with a stock Wraith cooler, but it was worth it to me for the better boost clocks and massively improved single thread performance (~4-9% faster than the 3700X/3800X for light workloads thanks to the 4.7+ GHz boost, maybe 2-3% for heavy workloads.)I am very happy with this chip so far and definitely recommend it if you are switching over from Intel or a first gen Ryzen and you cannot get yours hands on the newer 5000 series Ryzen chips. This CPU works great for both gaming and productivity, and uses far less power than an i7-10700K or i9-10850K, which I had considered but I like AMD\'s PCIE4 support and upgrade path better than Intel\'s.CPU: AMD 3800XTMB: Asus Prime X570-ProRAM: 64 GB Crucial Ballistix DDR4-3600 @ 1900 MHz (DDR-3800) 16-18-18-38, 1:1 with infinity fabricVC: Gigabyte 5700XT OC (2nd gen)PS: Corsair RMX750Case: Corsair 750DDrives: Multiple Samsung 860/970 SSDs (2.5" and NVME M.2)OS: Windows 10 ProCPU-Z Score: https://valid.x86.fr/bench/mxru2m/1', 'Claramente es un procesador muy muy bueno para todo, y va a poder tirar de todas las gráficas del momento y de las nuevas, pero también tiene sus desventajas.Solo ponerla a funcionar ya te das cuenta al poner hwmonitor, hwinfo o el mismo ryzen master de que 1,45 y 1,48v en los test de estres (y en muchas situaciones de baja carga también navegando por windows o internet) no es algo cercano a normal, claramente es un límite demasiado alto el que coge por defecto amd para este micro, por lo que queda descartado para alguien que no entienda de bios, oc, undervolt, etc.En mi caso al trastear, he conseguido buenas cifras dejándolo a 4,4ghz a 1.2250V y bajándole 10 grados (puedo llegar a 4,5ghz a 1.35V, pero no merece la pena por que sube mucho el calor y ganas poco), lo que lo deja actualmente en 72º en test de estres a tope, cosa que será un horno en verano si lo dejo así (mi criorig h5 universal no da para mas, ya está viejo xD), así que tocará tirar de una refrigeración de aire de las mas top ya que no me gustan las líquidas, pero igualmente sabía que tarde o temprano tendría que cambiar mi disipación ya que tiene bastantes años, por lo que para mi no es un problema.El problema de agesa y sus versiones me las podré evitar, ya que mi msi krait gaming x370 está muerta en actualizaciones hace ya bastante y tiene pinta que se va a quedar así, por lo que un quebradero de cabeza menos mientras dure la placa, pero para el que tenga alguna mas top de las 450 en adelante y estén todavía actualizando, como dicen los compañeros, se convertirá en una ruleta de voltages y de cambios en la bios cada vez que se actualice, así que tenedlo en cuenta.Por lo demás es un bicho y tira de todo, pero hay que dejarla fina y olvidarse de esos tan bien sonantes 4,7ghz en 1 núcleo, ya que se sacrifica bastante y un voltage tan alto de stock no puede ser bueno para la vida del procesador.Dejo el tocho informativo y me despido, saludos a todos y espero que ayude a quien se lo plantee comprar.P.D. amazon si pensabas bajar 15€ después de 1 semana de haberlo comprado, avisa co** xD.', "Riscrivo la mia recensione dopo quasi 6 mesi di utilizzo:Che dire, ancora soddisfattissimo, soprattutto perchè in questo tempo ho avuto modo di conoscere meglio le qualità di questo processore, e posso dire che il suo massimo potenziale lo raggiunge in Overclock, in particolare consiglio il programma CTR di 1usmus, dove viene applicato un OC ibrido su single e multi core, con voltaggi che si adattano al carico, il mio processore è particolarmente buono e riesce a tenere stabilmente 4550 Mhz su tutti gli 8 core con 1.36V (ottimo per i giochi, chi impegano massimo un 50% della CPU), mentre con settaggi più conservativi (che si attivano ad esempio durante un render pesante) tiene 4425 Mhz con 1.25V. Ovviamente rinnovo il consiglio di avere un impianto di raffredamento potente, perchè comunque scalda.Il mio consiglio finale quindi è di non comprare questo processore se intendete lasciarlo stock, perchè i miglioramenti rispetto ad un 3700x sono trascurabili, e il boost stock AMD (ma anche dei vari tools delle schede madri tipo ASUS performanche enhancer, che ho provveduto a disattivare una volta capito che non serviva a nulla se non consumare di più) utilizzano veramente voltaggi killer (con conseguenti consumi e temperature elevate) per ottenere delle frequenze ''basse'' (su cinebench raggiunge 4375 Mhz all core applicando un'insensato 1.389V, come ho detto prima con un OC manuale si raggiungono frequenza più alte con voltaggi molto più bassi).Discorso molto simile sul single core, i 4.7 Ghz vengono raggiunti (e anche leggermente superati) da stock, però con voltaggi mooolto vicini agli 1.5V, mentre con CTR per raggiungere 4.725 Ghz su carichi molto leggeri si usano 1.45V, volore decisamente più sensato.Tirando le somme quindi:Se fate OC manuale o volete provare CTR di 1usmus cosigliatissimo, se non avete intenzione di metterci le mani andate di 3700x e rispiarmiate dei soldi. Perchè un 3700x e non uno della serie 5000? Semplice, con i soldi risparimiati e una piccola aggiunta ci comprate un monitor 1440p, ed ecco che come per magia vi troverete un processore che va uguale (in game) ma avete 2 core in più rispetto ad un 5600x con relativo margine di utilizzo per il futuro (e in produttività)! Ragionate, non fermativi ai puri benchamrk fatti con una 3090 in 1080p e dettagli medi, nella realtà le differenze fra i processori per chi non fa un utilizzo lavorativo sono moooolto minori", 'Mit dem 3800 XT habe ich mittlerweile die 3. CPU aus der 3000 er Serie nach 3800X, 3900X und nun 3800XT.Ich darf jetzt kurz erklären: mein 3800X liegt an der obersten Grenze der Leistungsstreuung, lockere 4500 Mhz Takt bei 1.35 V, 3800Mhz RAM mit 16 er Latenzen, mein 3900X ist eher eine durchschnittliche CPU mit max 4350 MHZ und max. 3600 Mhz RAM mit 14er Latenzen.Zum Vergleich mit dem 3800XT: Ich habe lange gewartet bis ich, eigentlich aus Neugier, eine XT Cpu gekauft habe, schlussendlich habe ich 15 € mehr bezahlt als für den X damals - was für mich OK ist.Out of the Box zum normalen X war in meinem System kein Unterschied festzustellen, kein einziger Test oder Benchmark hatte eine Abweichung die nicht unter Messtoleranz fällt.Die ersten Unterschiede werden mit AMD`s PBO erkennbar - der XT taktet dann nämlich auf einzelnen Kernen bis auf 4,9 GHZ ! Allerdings bringt das nur dem bewundernden Betrachter von HW Info etwas den die Leistungsspitzen liegen immer genau am Ende eines Benchmarks an - genau genommen in der ersten Sekunde wenn der Benchmark vorbei ist - bringt Leistungstechnisch also nichts ! Beim Manuellen Einstellen des Taktes funktioniert das gleiche was beim X auch funktioniert UND es lassen sich sogar noch 50 Mhz drauf legen - ich konnte also 4550 MhZ all Core stabil ( Prime 95) einstellen - beim Ram 3600 mit 14er Latenzen - es scheint somit eine eher durchschnittliche CPU zu sein denn man liest ja von teilweise 4,7 GhZ all Core Prozessoren.Wie auch immer: egal ob 4,5 beim X oder 4,55 GhZ beim XT die Testergebnisse sind nahezu ident, egal ob CB 15, CB 20, Prime 95, die 50 MHZ bringen KEINEN nennenswerten Zuwachs an Leistung.Mein Fazit: Wie schon beim Erscheinen der XT CPU`s habe ich vermutet, dass es sich um besonders gut selektierte CPU`s der letzten Fertigungs Generation der 3000er Serie handelt und genau so kann man es auch stehen lassen. Die XT`s sind sehr gut Taktende X Cpu`s wer Pech hat bekommt eben nicht zufällig eine Spitzen CPU wie ich, bei den XT Modellen kann man sich aber die maximal mögliche Leistung zu recht erhoffen und erwarten aber mehr als 15 - 30 € würde ich für 3% Mehrleitung nicht ausgeben, der 3800 mit X oder mit XT ist trotzdem mein Favorit bei der 3000er Serie.Update: mit etwas Zeit und Testen mit verschiedenen Spannung - Settings habe ich nun stabile 4,6 Ghz all Core, 3600 Mhz Ram mit 14 er Latenzen, CB 15, CB 20 stabil, Prime 95 instabil .Das entspricht fast genau einem + von 40 % gegenüber einem 2700x bei 20% weniger Stromverbrauch - wenn mich jemand nach der derzeit besten Allround CPU fragt: 3800 XT wenn der Preis bei dem des X liegt.', "Upgraded from a 2700X and machine is performing better.This CPU does perform extremely well for many applications I've tried such as gaming and CAD although is not a worthwhile significant upgrade from my old 2700X. Having been in a situation where I needed a new CPU the 3800XT was chosen as it offered, at least on paper, a marked clock speed improvement on the 2700X and the CPU was on sale. I must say the CPU is hitting 4.7GHz single core boost straight out of the box and 4.5GHz multi-core boost. Paired with an AIO cooler this performance is not marred with high temperatures either - on multi-core boost it merely touches 72C. This CPU is designed for higher end machines and therefor requires an excellent cooling solution.Overclocking? In my opinion you will yeald a performance boost in only particular specific applications. For gaming just set XMP on in BIOS and allow the single-core to boost to 4.7GHz. Manual overclocking disables the single core boost and therefor you will likely not get extra performance in gaming. Of course with next gen consoles utilising the same basic architecture as the CPU (8C/16T), in the future an overclocked multi-core setup may be beneficial.", "My build benchmarked in the 92nd percentile of current PC's in the world, with the stock AMD CPU cooler, (no liquid)!My Current PC build:• AMD Ryzen 7 3800XT 8-core/16-Threads.• AMD Wraith Prism CPU Cooler with Copper Base & 4 Heat Pipes.• EVGA GeForce RTX-3060.• ASUS ROG Strix B450 ATX Motherboard.• 32GB (4x8GB) DDR4 3200MHz Corsair Vengeance RGB PRO Desktop Memory.• 1TB Western Digital Blue M.2/NVMe Internal SSD, Gen3 PCIe up to 2,400 MB/s.• Seasonic FOCUS GX-650, 650W 80+Gold Full-Modular PSU.• 3x SilverStone AB120R 120mm PWM Addressable RGB Case Fans.• EVGA PowerLink; PCI-e 12volt power adapter, part # 600-PL-2816-LR (EVERYONE should be using this on their GPU).• Windows 10 Pro• Adobe Creative Suite Master Collection 5• Asphalt Legends 9Only the very wealthy (or foolish), feel a need to buy a 3080/3090 GPU, AMD 5950x, an intel i9-11900k. The real crazy folks purchase an AMD Threadripper or Intel Xeon.This CPU will crush most kids gaming or make great creative content!", "CPU seems to check out, my only gripe is I bought it new, but it did not come in the standard Ryzen box, but instead was shipped inside of a small plastic case, with the cooler and it's cardboard cutout inside of a plain shipping box. Not sure of the point in taking it out of the box, to ship it in a box that's exactly the same size, doesn't make me feel too secure in my purchase. Will update if anything changes, but like I said, the chip seems to be as advertised", 'Coming from a 2700x the performance difference is pretty noticeable, especially in single threaded tasks.  However, unlike the 2700x, this is of a chiplet design.  There is only 1 8 core chiplet on this CPU that is designed to run very fast and since it is manufactured at 7nm is EXTREMELY heat dense and runs hot.  I have this in a well ventilated case and have tried custom water cooling with the corsair cpu water block, a Noctua NH-U14S, and now a dual fan NHD15S.  Temps have honestly all been about the same.  After a few weeks I gave up trying to fight the CPU, now I just run it with PBO disabled in BIOS and set a fairly long fan curve for the CPU fans and just let it run as is with only XMP enabled.  Either the 3900X or 3700x run cooler for different reasons.  Overall, very satisfied with the purchase though.  Very fast CPU for gaming and streaming.  Very happy with the purchase and yes I was holding out for a 5900X but with garbage stock levels and pricing on most computer components right now I wanted to upgrade so here it is. :)', "Upgraded from a Ryzen 2600. CPU roughly 30-40% better for about $150 more.  If you can get it on sale, it's worth the money. Otherwise, go with 5000 series Ryzen or a 3700X if available (usually $100 cheaper and near identical performance).Happy with the chip overall - it was available at a lower price point compared to anything else that was worth investing in at the time. Works well in both gaming and hobbyist graphic design/music/video production. Pair with fast RAM for best results. Use an aftermarket cooler because it gets toasty if you overclock it.  You don't need anything special to run it at stock. I use a Scythe Mugen 5 Rev.B and it averages about 50-60 degrees under load. There are plenty of similar coolers (4-6 heat pipes) around $40-50 CAD that will work just as well."]

Product: Intel Core i5-10400 (base stroke: 2.90 GHz; socket: LGA1200; 65 watt) box
Reviews: ["Ho acquisato l'i5 10400 per installarlo su motherboard Asrock B460M STEEL LEGEND in un PC secondario che è dedicato all'uso ufficio ed ha un cabinet ultraslim in cui non ci sta una scheda grafica dedicata.La scelta è caduta sul 10400 perché è un esacore con hyper treading (mentre i nuovi Intel serie 11 ne sono privi).Il processore è, come atteso, assolutamente sovrabbondante per l'uso ufficio, con una riserva di potenza enorme.Per altri utilizzi più impegnativi è sempre molto valido.Ma se si vogliono ottenere le prestazioni massime è necessario considerare un importantissimo accorgimento, che incrementa sensibilmente la potenza disponibile.Il processore in questione ha un TDP di 65 Watt nominale, il che si traduce in una frequenza di funzionamento standard di 2,9 GHz per ogni core. Solo occasionalmente, con l'attivazione del Turbo Boost si va ben oltre, arrivando anche a 4 GHZ, con conseguente aumento temporaneo della potenza. Dopo breve tempo, però, il processore riprende ad operare entro i limiti di potenza di 65 W nominali. Questo non per problemi termici, ma unicamente per ragioni commerciali, ossia per diversificare il 10400 dai modelli superiori e renderlo a basso consumo.Molte motherboard di varie marche e, che io sappia, tutte le Asrock con chipset Intel 4XX e 5XX dispongono della possibilità di baypassare nel BIOS il limite di potenza, portandolo oltre.Ogni produttore ha la propria soluzione, con differente denominazione commerciale (Asus la chiama APE), ma personalmente preferisco la BFB di Asrock per due motivi:- la potenza attribuibile alla CPU è sino a 125 Watt e quindi non supera mai le specifiche massime Intel, così preservando il processore da eccessi;- l'impostazione è attivata di default su Auto, che comunque sembra sfruttare tutta la potenza disponibile.Con motherboard di altre aziende va tenuto conto che non tutte prevedono questa opzione e che di dafult è disattivata.Ad ogni modo, l'attivazione dell'opzione BFB (o con altro nome nel caso di altri produttori) l'i5 10400 non è più limitato dal TDP di 65 W, ma può sprigionare tutta la sua potenza con TDP a 125 W.HWInfo mostra come tutti i 6 core lavorino contemporaneamente a ben 4,3 GHz di frequenza base costante, con conseguente notevole incremento della potenza di calcolo. In sostanza tutti i core possono funzionare in frequenza massima contemporaneamente e senza limiti.Le prestazioni divengono, quindi, non molto distanti da quelle di un i5 10600K che lavori a frequenza standard (ossia senza overclock); manca solo un ulteriore Turbo Boost per arrivare esattamente pari, ma l'incremento prestazionale dell'i5 10400 è impressionante.Il rovescio della medaglia di tale incremento di frequenza e potenza è l'aumento del consumo, ovviamente. Per quanto riguarda il calore prodotto, il dissipatore stock è in grado di smaltirlo senza problemi.E' da tenere conto che questa opzione non danneggia la CPU perché la stessa continua ad operare entro le specifiche della serie i5, comportandosi in maniera simile, come detto, ad un i5 10600K senza overclock che operi sempre intorno alla frequenza base.E' peraltro sempre possibile variare il BFB, settandolo a piacere su altri valori, che spaziano da 70 a 125 Watt a passi di 5 W, così da raggiungere un compromesso tra prestazioni e consumi, ove necessario.Considerando il prezzo del processore, poter disporre di fatto di un modello che è qusi pari al modello di punta della serie i5 non è poco.Posso dire che nei fatti il 10400 con BFB attivo surclassa l'i7 6700 K che ho nel computer principale, con un divario che diviene consistente soprattutto nelle applicazioni che fanno largo uso del multicore e del multitread.Riguardo alla grafica, l'Intel UHD630 non è certo paragonabile ad una scheda grafica dedicata.Ma per l'uso ufficio ed in generale per impieghi non molto impegnativi va anche meglio del previsto, con una gestione fluida della applicazioni e buone prestazioni di decodifica video.Per 161 Euro ritengo sia stato un'ottimo acquisto. Sto valutando, infatti, di sostituire l'7 6700K con un i9 10900, che grazie alla tecnologia BFB riesce a confrontarsi con un i9 10900K o 10850K, pur costando sensibilmente meno.", 'Como não é modelo F vem com gráficos integrados, da pra jogar praticamente todos os jogos com gráficos no Low, mas se quiser gráficos bonitos é recomendado uma placa de video dedicada, produto muito bom e ótimo custo beneficio.', 'We bought it to build a PC and it seems to be working great', 'Utilisé en bureautique avec la partie graphique intégrée le proc rempli parfaitement son travail.', 'Entrega a tiempo y en buen estado', 'Fácil instalação, já vem com cooler e pasta térmica. Como meu foco não são jogos, pra mim está ótimo. Achei que demorou a chegar. Foram quase 10 dias. Sou de MG.', 'Bueno', 'Según no da vídeo sin gráfica y a mí sí me dió vídeo y me jalo al 100 sin gráfica, obviamente no jugué en PC sin gráfica más que nada me sirvió para instaciones y entretenimiento normal pero ya con gráfica está más mamalon 100% recomendado', 'Great Just Great', 'ótimo procesador.']

Product: Intel Core i3-10100 (Base Clock 3.60GHz; Socket LGA1200; 65 Watt) Box
Reviews: ['Comprado por 110 € el 3 de marzo de 2023. Vendido y gestionado por amazon.esEl primero me llegó desprecintado con marcas de uso y restos de pasta térmica, me dió muy mala impresión.Solicité un reemplazo y todo correcto.Muy buen procesador para un ordenador de uso doméstico; con 8 gb ddr4 y SSD va muy muy fluido. Tengo otro ordenador con un i7 8700 y en el tiempo de arranque, photoshop, internet, procesador de textos y juegos muy sencillos no puedo percibir ninguna diferencia.Con un pure rock de bequiet! muy buenas temperaturas con el ventilador a unas 400 rpm.Muy recomendado.', 'parfait', 'Non penso ci sia niente di più economico e funzionante, su userbrenchmark va a un 80% di average bemchmark,installato da qualche mese e finora nessun problema', 'A winner from intel with integrated graphics. A thing to consider though is that you can get a 12th gen core i3 for pretty much  the same rate', 'Ideal para programas regulares o para trabajar en online. Bueno para trabajos 3D no profesionales o edición de vídeo. Si trabajas a alto nivel con programas anteriores, te recomiendo que te hagas con un procesador más potente.Muy contento con el precio y la calidad de esta gama.', 'Tutto perfetto', "...un Articolo di Brand & di Qualita'... funziona perfettamente questa CPU, veloce Cuore della Scheda madre, per cui Prodotto consigliato.", "I have used several Core series CPUs and have got to say this has really impressed me for the price range you can't go wrong I got the version with Intel HD Graphics no (F) at end of model number. Super-fast runs under 150F with stock cooler at 95% CPU load per task manager, I put my good heatsink/fan and at 95% load it runs under 130F and idles at about 78F. Either way is really good if you don't have an aftermarket one. This is a Quad core not Duel like the older ones also hyperthreading. Just buy you will see.", 'Ottimo processore con grafica integrata cosi risparmio sulla scheda video che non mi serve, va bene per navigare in internet, vedere documenti foto e video in hd, velocissimo per me va bene cosi.', "Ho comprato questa Cpu per assemblare un computer prettamente destinato ad uso ufficio e quindi senza stare a prendere una scheda video dedicata, visto soprattutto il momento storico in cui siamo e i prezzi fuori dal comune. Questo I3 svolge egregiamente il suo lavoro: per un Pc volto ad un uso basic, quindi navigazione internet, applicazioni Office e visione di contenuti video in streaming va benissimo, forse è anche troppo. La grafica integrata è ottima per svolgere questo tipo di lavoro e non serve molto di più alla fine; certo per giocare è un altro paio di maniche, non l'ho testato in gaming ma gioco forza poi ci vuole una scheda video dedicata secondo me. Per il resto consuma poco, scalda poco ed è stabile, preso a poco più di 100 euro vale sicuramente la spesa!"]

Product: Intel® Celeron G-5900 Desktop Processor 2 Cores 3.4 GHz LGA1200 (Intel® 400 Series chipset) 58W, Model Number: BX80701G5900
Reviews: ['Good', "This is a fully compliant Socket 1200 Intel chip and is compatible with both Z490 and Z590 systems.Power wise it is the weakest of all the CPUs (2 cores), but what it lacks in power it makes up for in price and to be used as a diagnostic/place holder CPU.I plan to use it to diagnose and repair Z490/Z590 motherboards and at such a great price (~$25) it is the type of CPU you stick on the shelf and forget about it till you need it.It even comes with a stock Intel cooler making it very easy to swap in quickly to systems and even bin some CPUs just placing it on top of a CPU for a quick boot.Outside of that? Maybe some basic use for a very non gaming / CPU intensive system. For gaming or anything CPU intensive, you will definitely  want to look elsewhere.For anyone who is getting intermittent CPU error lights that tend to toggle between two colors in their diagnostic panel (Usually CPU and Memory error lights), it is most likely not the CPU but the fact this CPU only supports ~2666 memory. Your memory is most likely running at a faster speed either by default or has been set to its XMP profile. Make sure to completely reset your BIOS by removing your CMOS battery (or jumping the bios reset jumper) to clear all settings. Some G-5900 CPUs can support faster memory but it is not guaranteed as the rating is for 2666 only. Also make sure if it isn't booting to check your motherboard QVL list to make sure the memory is compatible with that motherboard and CPU.5/5", 'Me gustaria tener la informacion para garantia 1 de los procesadores no me funciono y quiero saber el procedimiento', 'I run a Minecraft 1.19.3 server on it. It runs it well a little slow to render chunks and you aren’t going to be able to max out viewing distance but It’s better than what I expected from a 20$ Cpu if you want a small scale server for like a NAS or MC server.', 'ネットサーフィンしたり、動画みたり、ゲーム以外の用途であれば、この石で十二分に役目を果たします。Celeronは強くなった。コストパフォーマンス抜群やん。', '', "This cpu shouldn't be used in a gaming pc or work station. I would suggest using this in a budget server or a GPU mining rig only. This is the best cpu for $100", 'Esta bien para su precio trabajo medio excelente para la escuela y navegar', 'Consegui este procesador por la oferta, es muy bueno, tambien sirve para jugar algunos juegos basicos como League of legends o juegos indie de steam, busqueda y navegacion por internet es aceptable, recomendado si lo que buscas es algo basico para ofimatica, no lo recomiendo para gaming profesional por sus bajos nucleos, de resto es una maravilla', 'According to the experts in computing and engineers they recommend that you can buy used cpus b/c if they are not harmed by any means. I bout this one, and the shipping was super fast. I recommend it. if it is used most commonly is sent w/no heatsink so I had to buy one on my own that is compatible with this cpu.']

Product: Intel® Core™ i3-10320 Desktop Processor 4 Cores up to 4.6 GHz LGA1200 (Intel® 400 Series chipset) 65W, Model Number: BX8070110320
Reviews: ['Good CPU for a budget gaming rig. It maintains 4.4 GHz on all cores during gaming. But never turbo boosts to 4.6 GHz. All cores have hit 4.5 GHz turbo boost but that is 1.0 GHz slower than intel says it can do. Also get a budget tower cooler as while gaming this CPU hit over 90C with the intel stock cooler. I gave it 4 stars due to this. If it would have boosted to 4.6 GHz I would have gave it 5 stars.', 'If you’re looking for a decent CPU (office and general stuff) this is your CPU', 'Basic desktop user that likes a responsive system, gone from a i3-6100 system built 5 years ago to this i3-10320. That likes to keep consumption as low as practical. 2 cores, 4 threads at 51w TDP. to 4 cores, 8 threads at 65w TDP. Together with a new motherboard and ram. Has provided quite an improvement.the quoted up to 4.6 turbo has only gone to 4.4 turbo. Using 48 watts at the cpu. Considering that a single core does the majority of the basic tasks. I am very happy with it.', 'Good price', 'This is a great CPU at this price point.', 'Used for a mining rig (basically runs windows and a few programs). Does a great job with no issues.', 'i like the speed of it i use it for my plex server', '多分、金額的にi5無印以下か同等くらいなのかもしれないが、正直そそる。intel-X90のマザボはCPUをOCできるので、通常流通と違う型版は同じ型版の「上質良品というのは、本当なのか」という実験体にしては面白いので購入。']

Quelle perte de temps. Lorsque je les ai appelé, ils faisaient comme si c'était moi qui s'était trompé dans mes commandes, très insultant.", 'Love it. have built many gamer and video rigs with this CPU', 'Ordered Intel® Core™ i9-10980XE but received Intel® Core™ i9 10920X', 'Amazon keeps showing the wrong box and description. An i9-10920x 12 core comes in a black box with white letters and it says "x-series" A 10980xe comes in a black box with gold letters and it says"Extreme It\'s also not $1168 more like $729. Product: Intel Core i9-10940X Desktop Processor 14 Cores up to 4.8GHz Unlocked LGA2066 X299 Series 165W, BX8069510940X
Reviews: ['Intel I9-10940 is a real workhorse CPU.  With 14 cores, it can handle as much multi-tasking as you can throw at it.  Being a full-stack software engineer, I throw a lot at it.  Gaming seems to be excellent also.  Installation was easy on an AORUS X299 Master MB.  I did not overclock but I still use for gaming and it works great.  Base speed is 3.31 GHz.  I looked at Ryzen but since I have a 80%/20% time split between production and gaming, I stuck with the Intel chip.  I have a friend who has a similar PC but went with Ryzen and he is happy as well so I think it comes down to personal preference.  There seems to be a bit of a price premium on the Intel processors though.Update April 2023 - I have been using this processor for 7-8 months now and I would whole-heartedly recommend it.  For programming it has been excellent.  I consistently use a virtual machine via Docker and this CPU handles it with aplomb.  Also, it has been great for gaming.  I just finished playing The Last of Us and it ran like a dream on my rig.  I considered an 13th gen processor when purchasing this, but I liked the cores and clock speed of this model.  So far, I have no regrets. I like the fact that the 10th gen processors and the X299 slot have the majority of kinks worked out by now.', 'Great processor', 'I use davinci and blender and render vids and projects and this thing is insanely great! Also game on it and runs anything you could need done with ease..', 'Great CPU and awesome seller. Fast responses and they even took the time to help me diagnose an issue on new system build that was not CPU related.', 'Awesome processor. Running 4.8ghz all core right now without much effort. May try to push for more soon.EDIT 4/7/2021 - been running 4.9GHz all core since soon after this review, Mesh at 3.2GHz. 1.32v core.', 'Worked as described.', 'I tried 2 different  CPU 2 brand new Motherboard 2 sets of Memory and didn\'t even get to postSo I had a "professional" to do it without any luckLooks like I run out of luck as well...']
